page.title: 16ONE DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: On the 30th May, 1985 I woke up to a lovely sunny morning. I washed and put on my new pink boiler suit then went down and handed my mum the leaflet she had to fill in so I could have my ears pierced! After feeding my rabbit and guinea pig I raced off to my friend's house. We then caught the bus outside my friend's house. It was hot and stuffy in the bus but we eventually arrived in Chester and got off outside 'Habitat', a very modern store. We went straight to Owen Owen and went to see the lady who was going to pierce our ears. She was out so we went round the shops for a while. Then we came back feeling a little nervous about having holey ears. She showed us a display of earings then she got out a sort of gun and punched through the stainless earing in my ear.{(Recreation) (Trade)}
